Reviews.Title: “The Lotus 'Boutique' Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kate O
Reviews.Content: recently stayed lotus boutique hotel recommend hotel located rundown city close airport miles else breakfast disappointing understatement stale bread terrible coffee hot chocolate poor selection fruit yoghurt restaurant food bad level cleanliness poor swimming pool hours claiming 6pm 9pm ensuring optimum sun hours staff nice unable carry basic task taxi providing information feel laugh stay night read inhouse hotel information pack lays claim designed menu

Reviews.Title: “Big, spacius, nice room”
Reviews.Author: Sajor
Reviews.Content: entered misunderstanding couldnt believe money paid buy spacious nice bed huge found rooftop pool imagine biggest else stay didnt matter actually magnetic key card change twice day annoying yes weird overcharging internet wireless wired day actually third price surprised spread dubai soon realized deira hotel doesnt offer climate hot walking option prepared cabs brand dubai metro breakfeast included particular booking day worth selection imagine morning youre middle east europe
